AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: Dr. M.M. Gharage Vidyavardhak Samsthe's Kumakale School & College. dedicated to empowering the next generation with world-class education.
AboutPage.missionDesc: To provide quality education to all classes of the society and empower students with knowledge, character, and skills.
AboutPage.visionDesc: To be a leading educational institution in North Karnataka, recognized for academic excellence and holistic development.
AboutPage.milestone1Desc: Kumakale School & PU College established by Mr. Pralhad Kumakale under Dr. M.M. Gharage Vidyavardhak Samsthe.
AboutPage.milestone2Desc: Inaugurated Degree College offering B.A. and B.Com programs, expanding higher education opportunities.
AboutPage.milestone3Desc: Officially recognized by the Department of Public Instruction & PUE Board.
AboutPage.milestone4Desc: Adopted National Education Policy (NEP) standards for Degree College.
AboutPage.milestone5Desc: Well-equipped computer labs and digital classrooms.
AboutPage.milestone6Desc: Consistent high pass percentage in SSLC and PUC examinations.
AboutPage.milestone7Desc: Over 4 years of rapid growth and community trust.
AboutPage.leadershipSubtitle: Guided by wisdom and dedication to social upliftment.
AboutPage.historySubtitle: From a humble beginning to a premier institution.
AboutPage.leader1Bio: Leading the institution with a vision for excellence and inclusive education for all.
AboutPage.leader2Bio: Founder & Chairman. The driving force behind the institution's commitment to quality.
AboutPage.leader3Bio: Principal. Leading the academic and administrative excellence of the institution.
AboutPage.leader4Bio: Overseeing the implementation of NEP and academic standards.
AboutPage.award1Desc: Recognized for providing high-quality education with minimum fees.
AboutPage.award2Desc: 1650+ students currently enrolled and excelling in their studies.
AboutPage.award3Desc: Students participating in annual cultural and sports activities.
AboutPage.award4Desc: Serving all classes of society with dedication and inclusivity.

AdmissionsPage.title: Join the
AdmissionsPage.description: Begin your journey towards academic excellence. Admissions open for SSLC, PUC, and Degree programs.
AdmissionsPage.portalDesc: Track your application status in real-time. Enter your SATS number for quick retrieval of details.
AdmissionsPage.readyDesc: Start your application today. Ensure you have your SATS number and Caste Certificate ready.
AdmissionsPage.processSubtitle: Your journey to excellence starts here
AdmissionsPage.step1Desc: Visit campus or contact us. Collect the prospectus.
AdmissionsPage.step2Desc: Submit application with SATS number and documents.
AdmissionsPage.step4Desc: Pay fees and secure provisional admission.
AdmissionsPage.eligibilitySubtitle: As per Karnataka State Board Norms
AdmissionsPage.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common admissions queries
AdmissionsPage.faq1Q: When does the admission process open for the next academic year?
AdmissionsPage.faq1A: Admissions typically open in January for the academic year starting in June. Early applications are encouraged as seats fill quickly.
AdmissionsPage.faq2Q: Is there an entrance exam for admission?
AdmissionsPage.faq2A: For High School, admission is based on previous academic records (SATS). For PU College, we verify SSLC marks.
AdmissionsPage.faq3A: Fee structures vary by program. Please contact our admissions office. Concessions available for high-merit students and specific categories.
AdmissionsPage.faq4A: Yes, we provide bus services covering major areas of Mudhol and surrounding villages. Routes are updated annually based on demand.
AdmissionsPage.faq5Q: Are there any scholarships or financial aid available?
AdmissionsPage.faq5A: We facilitate State Scholarship Portal (SSP) applications. Merit scholarships are also available for 90%+ scorers in SSLC.
AdmissionsPage.faq6A: We maintain a healthy ratio of 1:25 to ensure personalized attention and effective learning.
AdmissionsPage.faq7Q: Can I visit the campus before applying?
AdmissionsPage.faq7A: Absolutely! We welcome parents and students to visit our campus. Please schedule an appointment through our admissions office for a guided tour.
AdmissionsPage.faq8A: We offer a wide range of activities including sports (cricket, basketball, athletics), arts (music, dance, painting), and clubs (robotics, debate, environmental club).
